page.title: 08RELIGIONS
page.content: There are 2 Christian worshipping places, the Parish Church and Methodist Chapel. The church ,built in 1150,has Rev. Collier as Vicar since 1974.He looks after 2 churches.In Summer there is an 8am Holy Communion Service and all year 11am communion .It has 64 members and average attendance 8am 5, 11 am 34.Annual payment to the Church Diocese Â£2726.It costs Â£5,250 a year to keep the church building going. The Methodist Chapel was built 1898 ,has Rev.Nowell as Minister(For 8 years)and he looks after 9 chapels.Castleton Chapel has 10.45 am Sunday Service, 16 members and average Sunday attendance is 12.The Chapel pays Â£630 a year to area headquarters and it costs Â£1000 a year for expenses.
